# addAnimation(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a closure you can use to animate view properties.

## Declaration

```swift
func addAnimation(_ block: @escaping () -> Void)
```

## Parameters

- **block**: A closure that sets animatable view properties and runs on the main thread.

## Adding an Animation

- **startFrame**: The size and location of the overlay before the transition.
- **endFrame**: The size and location of the overlay at the end of the transition.
